model_answer: B: Because, while he criticizes the candidates’ hawkish foreign policy and sees little difference among them, he notes Romney may be more willing to listen to advisors; the on-screen “cordial” label and Romney rally visuals reinforce that tone.

Answer: B: It will devalue the dollar and harm the middle class; captions read “MORE STIMULUS HURTS THE DOLLAR” and “MIDDLE CLASS HURT BY WEAK DOLLAR.”

The transcript reveals that Rep. Paul is concerned about the negative effects of additional monetary stimulus on the value of the dollar and the well-being of the middle class. The use of phrases like “ MORE STIMULUS HURTS THE DOLLAR” and “MIDDLE CLASS HURT BY WEAK DOLLAR” clearly indicate his belief that such measures could lead to a decline in the value of the currency, which would negatively impact those who rely on it, particularly the middle class.
